headline: Malcom Floyd cleared for contact
title: San Diego Chargers WR Malcom Floyd cleared for contact
description: Chargers wide receiver Malcom Floyd says he has been cleared for contact after missing most of last season following a scary neck injury.

images.name: Floyd_Malcolm 140527 [300x300]
images.caption: Chargers wide receiver Malcom Floyd says he has been cleared for contact after missing most of last season following a scary neck injury.

headline: Giants, Lions open MNF schedule
shortLinkText: Giants, Lions kick off MNF twinbill
title: 2014 Monday Night Football schedule revealed
description: ESPN's 2014 Monday Night Football slate will open in Detroit and Glendale, Ariz., for the season-opening Sept. 8 doubleheader as 26 of the league's 32 teams will make an appearance on MNF.

images.name: Monday Night Football September Schedule Preview
images.caption: Tim Hasselbeck breaks down the big matchups in September on Monday Night Football.

video.title: Monday Night Football September Schedule Preview

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL News (Monday Night Football September Schedule Preview) 2014/04/23

video.description: Tim Hasselbeck breaks down the big matchups in September on Monday Night Football.

video.title: NFL Games To Watch

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Feature (NFL Games To Watch/Reunion Games) 2014/04/24 NFL Live CC

video.description: Tim Hasselbeck, Jerome Bettis and Ryan Clark discuss which games they are most looking forward to watching this season and which reunion games they most want to see this year.

headline: J.J. Watt has option exercised

related.title: Ganguli: Extension should be next for Watt

title: Houston Texans exercise fifth-year option on J.J. Watt's contract
description: The Houston Texans have officially exercised the fifth-year option on DE J.J. Watt's contract for the 2015 season, per a league source.

images.name: Watt_JJ 140417 [300x200]
images.caption: The Texans have exercised the fifth-year option on star defensive end J.J. Watt's contract for the 2015 season, a league source said.

headline: Shawne Merriman joins WWE
shortLinkText: Career change: Ex-NFL star Merriman to WWE
title: Shawne Merriman, former member of San Diego Chargers and Buffalo Bills, joins WWE
linkText: Career change: Ex-NFL star Merriman to WWE
description: Shawne Merriman is going from the football field to the wrestling ring.

headline: Chargers, city to start stadium talks
title: San Diego Chargers begin talks for new stadium
linkText: Chargers, city to discuss stadium proposal
description: Newly elected San Diego mayor Kevin Faulconer and the San Diego Chargers have started the process of establishing a dialogue that both sides hope will ultimately lead to a new stadium project that keeps the team in the city.

images.name: Qualcomm Stadium (parking lot) 131110 [300x200] - Copy
images.caption: The Chargers have long sought a new home to replace Qualcomm Stadium, which was built in 1967.

headline: Richard Marshall back to Chargers
shortLinkText: Marshall back to Chargers on 1-year deal
title: Richard Marshall returning to San Diego Chargers
linkText: Marshall back to Chargers on 1-year deal
description: The San Diego Chargers continued to fortify their depth in the secondary, agreeing to terms with cornerback Richard Marshall on a one-year deal Friday, the team announced.

headline: Chargers sign QB Kellen Clemens

related.title: Wagoner: Rams should have kept Clemens

title: San Diego Chargers agree to 2-year deal with QB Kellen Clemens
description: The San Diego Chargers agreeing to terms on a two-year deal with Kellen Clemens, the team announced this afternoon.

headline: Chargers agree with Donald Brown
title: San Diego Chargers agree with Donald Brown
linkText: Chargers add ex-Colts RB Brown to backfield
description: Looking for a running back to complement every-down back Ryan Mathews, the San Diego Chargers appear to have found their match in Indianapolis Colts free agent Donald Brown.

headline: Chargers re-sign OL Chad Rinehart
shortLinkText: Chargers re-sign OL Rinehart to 2-year deal
title: Chad Rinehart agrees to 2-year deal to return to San Diego Chargers
linkText: Chargers re-sign OL Rinehart to 2-year deal
description: San Diego Chargers general manager Tom Telesco continued his effort to keep impact players from the team's 2013 postseason run on the current roster, agreeing to terms on a two-year deal with offensive lineman Chad Rinehart.

headline: Hakeem Nicks set for free agency
shortLinkText: Free agent WR Nicks: I can be 'missing link'

related.title: Hakeem Nicks sends out letters from doctors clearing him for 2014

title: Hakeem Nicks of New York Giants set for free agency, says he can be 'missing link'
linkText: Free agent WR Nicks: I can be 'missing link'
description: Hakeem Nicks emphasized Sunday that he wants a long-term contract as a free agent, claiming he can be a "missing link" to a team with championship aspirations.

images.name: Fletcher_Bradley 131006 [300x200]
images.caption: Hakeem Nicks said 'there are a number of teams that I have my eye on' once he becomes an unrestricted free agent Tuesday.
